title: Client wont open (Windows 10)
body:
Whenever I attempt to open League of Legends, the logo would pop up, but then it will close itself out. 

So far i've tried.

- Running it as administrator
- Deleting  lol_launcher & lol_patcher in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects     (the air_client thing isn't there)
- Tried EUW, EUNE and NA Client

replies.body: I have the same problem and even posted something like this yesterday, but mine doesn't pop up and close, it just stays running in the background. I was hoping the new patch might somehow fix this, but no. I hope both of us find a solution.

Issues launching League can be caused by a number of things, however, because you worked through permissions already, it's most likely caused by a poor connection to the servers. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to resolve this issue. 

Let me know if you experience any change after taking those steps.
